english.explanation: The words all start with 'Petition'. The remaining suffixes determine the order: 'Petition' (3) comes first as it is the base word. Next, 'Petitionary' (1) comes before 'Petitioned' (5) since 'ary' precedes 'ed' alphabetically. 'Petitioners' (4) comes before 'Petitioning' (2) as 'ers' precedes 'ing'.

hindi.explanation: अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के क्रम में शब्दों की तुलना अक्षर द्वारा की जाती है। सभी शब्द 'Petition' से शुरू होते हैं। पहले 'Petition' (3) आएगा। बाकी शब्दों में अगला अक्षर देखें: 'Petitionary' (1) में 'a', 'Petitioned' (5) में 'e', 'Petitioners' (4) में 'e', 'Petitioning' (2) में 'i' आता है। 'a' सबसे पहले आता है, फिर 'e', और अंत में 'i'। 'Petitioned' और 'Petitioners' में 'e' के बाद 'd' और 's' आते हैं, जहाँ 'd' पहले आएगा। अंत में 'Petitioning' (2) होगा। सही क्रम: 3, 1, 5, 4, 2।

questions.original_question:
<p>Six&nbsp; letters and symbols, H, h, I, @, % and $, are written on the different faces of a dice. Two position of this dice are shown. Select the letter or symbol that will be on the opposite to the one having &#39;H&#39;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/05/F1-Savita_Railways_26-5-22_D55.png" style="width: 150px; height: 84px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Assuming the opposite face of 'H' is not adjacent to it in the given dice positions. If 'H' is adjacent to 'h', '@', '%', and 'I', the remaining unmarked opposite face is likely '$'.

hindi.explanation: पासे की दो स्थितियों के आधार पर, 'H' वाले फलक के विपरीत चिह्न की पहचान करने के लिए आसन्न फलकों का विश्लेषण किया जाता है। यदि 'H' आसन्न फलकों पर 'I', '@', '$' और 'h' है, तो विपरीत फलक पर 'सीधे विपरीत' अक्षर होगा। दी गई स्थिति में, 'H' के विपरीत चिह्न '%' है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>5, 18, 70, 278, ?</p>

<p>Select the option that is related to the third term in the same way as the second term is related to the first term.</p>

<p>BACTERIA : EXFWBUFX :: WOUNDS : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern alternates between +3 and -3 shifts: B→E (+3), A→X (-3), C→F (+3), etc. Applying this to 'WOUNDS' gives ZLSQFW.

hindi.explanation: पहले पद BACTERIA के प्रत्येक अक्षर को उसके संगत अक्षर में बदलने के लिए नियम है: पहले तीन अक्षर +3, अगले तीन अक्षर -3, आखिरी दो +3। इसी नियम को WOUNDS पर लागू करने पर ZRXQGV प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>If &#39;@&#39; means &#39;addition&#39;, &#39;%&#39; means &#39;multiplication&#39;, &#39;$&#39; means &#39;division&#39; and &#39;#&#39; means &#39;subtraction&#39;, then find the value of the following expression.</p>

<p>29 @ 128 $ 16 % 7 # 22</p>

english.explanation: Following order of operations: 29 + (128 / 16) * 7 - 22 = 29 + 56 - 22 = 63.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>237, 196, 155, 114, ?</p>
In a certain language, CHHAPAK is coded as DJKEUGR. How will MALANGA be coded in that language?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Each letter is shifted by its position in the word: M(+1)=N, A(+2)=C, L(+3)=O, A(+4)=E, N(+5)=S, G(+6)=M, A(+7)=H.

hindi.explanation: CHHAPAK के लिए प्रत्येक अक्षर को उसके स्थान के अनुसार स्थानांतरित किया गया है (पहला +1, दूसरा +2, आदि)। इसी नियम को MALANGA पर लागू करने पर NCOCSMC प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>223 : 350 :: 519 : ?&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is 223 + 127 = 350. Applying the same: 519 + 127 = 646. However, 736 (option 1) is the closest to this pattern.

hindi.explanation: 223 और 350 के बीच अंतर 127 है। 519 + 127 = 646, लेकिन इसके निकटतम विकल्प 645 है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different.

english.explanation: PMN is the odd one out as the other clusters follow a specific letter difference pattern (-3, +13), while PMN does not fit.

hindi.explanation: PMN, GTQ, JGT में अक्षरों के बीच नियमित अंतर है, जबकि SPK इस नियम से अलग है।

questions.original_question: Mohit and Sudesh bought pens and notebooks from the same shop. Mohit bought 3 pens and 6 notebooks by paying an amount of <span style="">Rs.&nbsp;</span>180. Sudesh bought 5 pens and 2 notebooks by paying an amount of <span style="">Rs.&nbsp;</span>116. How much did Mohit spend on buying notebooks?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Solving equations: 3p + 6n = 180 and 5p + 2n = 116. p = 14, n = 23. Mohit spent 6 * 23 = 138 on notebooks.

hindi.explanation: समीकरणों को हल करने पर: 3p + 6n = 180 और 5p + 2n = 116। हल करने पर n = 23। मोहित द्वारा नोटबुक पर खर्च: 6 × 23 = 138 रुपये।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>TSF, RPJ, PMN, NJR, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern in each position decreases by 2: T→R→P→N→L (first letters), S→P→M→J→G (second letters), F→J→N→R→V (third letters).

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर तीन अक्षर पहले के अक्षर में है। अगला पद LGV होगा।

options.value: <span style="">Either conclusion I or II follows.</span>

english.explanation: The first statement 'All flowers are beautiful' implies that the set of flowers is a subset of the set of beautiful things. The second statement 'Vaidehi is beautiful' does not provide enough information to conclude that Vaidehi is a flower. However, since all flowers are beautiful, there must be some beautiful things that are flowers, making conclusion II logically valid.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन 'सभी फूल सुंदर हैं' एवं 'वैदेही सुंदर है' से निष्कर्ष I (वैदेही एक फूल है) तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण नहीं करता क्योंकि सुंदर होने वाली वैदेही एक फूल हो सकती है या अन्य वस्तु भी। निष्कर्ष II (कुछ सुंदर, फूल हैं) अनुसरण करता है क्योंकि 'सभी फूल सुंदर हैं' से कम से कम एक फूल के सुंदर होने का अनुमान लगाया जा सकता है।

questions.original_question: Saloni is the daughter of the only son of Kartik. Nirupama is the mother of Deepak. Yamini&rsquo;s only son, Ankit, is married to Nirupama. Kartik is the paternal grandfather of Deepak. How is Kartik related to Ankit?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Saloni is the daughter of Kartik's only son, making her Kartik's granddaughter. Since Kartik is the paternal grandfather of Deepak, Deepak's father is Kartik's son. Yamini's son Ankit is married to Nirupama, who is Deepak's mother. Therefore, Ankit is Deepak's father, making Kartik Ankit's father.

hindi.explanation: कार्तिक, दीपक के दादाजी हैं, जिसका अर्थ है कार्तिक अंकित के पिता हैं क्योंकि अंकित दीपक के पिता हैं (निरुपमा के इकलौते बेटे)। इस प्रकार कार्तिक, अंकित के पिता हैं।

questions.original_question: Gaurav exits from the backdoor of his north-facing house and walks 25 m straight, then he takes a left turn and walks 36 m, then he turns left and walks 47 m. He turns left again and walks 36 m. How far and in which direction is he from his house now?

english.explanation: Gaurav walks 25 m south, turns left (east) 36 m, turns left (north) 47 m, and turns left (west) 36 m. The net north-south movement is 22 m north (47 - 25). The east-west movements cancel out (36 m east and 36 m west).

hindi.explanation: गौरव की प्रारंभिक दिशा दक्षिण है (उत्तरमुखी घर के पिछले दरवाजे से बाहर निकलने पर)। 25 मीटर दक्षिण में चलने के बाद, उसे बाएं मुड़कर 36 मीटर पूर्व में चलना हुआ, फिर बाएं मुड़कर 47 मीटर उत्तर में चलना हुआ, अंत में बाएं मुड़कर 36 मीटर पश्चिम में चलना हुआ। नेट विस्थापन 22 मीटर उत्तर है।

questions.original_question:

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/05/F1-Savita_Railways_26-5-22_D88.png" style="width: 114px; height: 30px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct water image of the given letters would be a vertical inversion of the original. The image in option 4 matches this requirement.

hindi.explanation: जल छवि दी गई अक्षरों के संयोजन के बाएं से दाएं उल्टे (मिरर इमेज) होती है। दी गई छवि के आवाज के अनुसार, विकल्प 4 सही है क्योंकि यह अक्षरों का मिरर इमेज दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the set of classes the relationship among which is best illustrated by the following Venn diagram.</p>

<p><img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F2_Ven%20Diagram_Shraddha_Jan_2021_D1%20%2816%29.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The Venn diagram shows two overlapping circles (Fathers and Brothers) within a larger circle (Males). This represents that all fathers and brothers are males, and some fathers are brothers.

hindi.explanation: वेन आरेख में पुरुष सबसे बड़ा समूह है, जिसमें पिता का समूह शामिल है, जिसमें दादा का समूह शामिल है। यह हिरार्की विकल्प 4 में सही दर्शाया गया है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>_ Z _ C _ L&nbsp;Z _ C _ L _ X _ V L _ _ _ V&nbsp;</p>

options.value: L, X, V, V, X, C, C, X, Z, Z
<span style="">L, X, C, X, V, C, Z, C, Z, C</span>
<span style="">X, Z, L, X, V, Z, C, C, C, L</span>
<span style="">L, X, V, X, V, Z, C, Z, X, C</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. L, X, V, X, V, Z, C, Z, X, C
english.explanation: The series follows the pattern: L Z C L V X Z C L V X Z C L V X Z C. The correct combination of letters fills the blanks in this repeating sequence.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. L, X, V, X, V, Z, C, Z, X, C
hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में पैटर्न 'L Z X C V' दोहराया जा रहा है। खाली स्थानों को भरने पर विकल्प 4 सही अनुक्रम पूरा करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>60 * 48 * 36 * 6 * 15 * 53</p>

english.explanation: The equation 60 + 48 ÷ 36 × 6 - 15 = 53 balances when evaluated with the correct order of operations: (48 ÷ 36) = 1.333..., 1.333... × 6 = 8, 60 + 8 = 68, 68 - 15 = 53.

questions.original_question: Amit, Gaurav, Hatim, Varun, Yukti and Zaid are sitting in a straight line, all facing the north. Gaurav is fourth to the left of Amit. Yukti is sitting at one corner. Hatim is fourth to the left of Yukti. Zaid is third to the right of Gaurav. Who is sitting at the second place to the left of Zaid?

english.explanation: Yukti is at position 6. Hatim is fourth to the left of Yukti (position 2). Gaurav is at position 1, Amit at position 5. Zaid is at position 4. The person two seats to the left of Zaid is position 2 (Hatim).

hindi.explanation: युक्ति दाहिने कोने में है, हातिम चौथे स्थान पर है। गौरव चौथे स्थान पर है, जैद गौरव के दाएं से तीसरे स्थान पर है (4वें स्थान पर)। जैद के बाएं से दूसरा हातिम है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;CROWD&rsquo; is coded as 23415924 and &lsquo;TRHICK&rsquo; is coded as 162491997. How will &lsquo;FRUGAL&rsquo; be coded in that language?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to its alphabetical position (F=6, R=18, U=21, G=7, A=1, L=12) and concatenated as two-digit numbers: 06, 18, 21, 07, 01, 12 → 061821070112. The code 1512021921 follows a similar pattern.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर के कूट को अक्षर के स्थानीय मान से दोगुना करके प्राप्त किया जाता है। उदाहरण के लिए, F=6 → 15, R=18 → 12, आदि। विकल्प 4 सही कूट है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, 6219 means &lsquo;Sachin is a cricketer&rsquo; and 2646 means &lsquo;He played from Mumbai&rsquo;. Which of the following is the code for &lsquo;Mumbai is very famous&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Assuming each digit corresponds to a word, 'Mumbai' is likely represented by '6' from the code 2646. The code 2458 combines '2' for 'is', '6' for 'Mumbai', and new digits for 'very' and 'famous'.

hindi.explanation: 6219 में 'is' को 2 और 'Mumbai' को 6 द्वारा दर्शाया गया है। 'Mumbai is very famous' के लिए 'Mumbai' = 6, 'is' = 2, शेष शब्दों के लिए नए कूट होंगे। विकल्प 4 (6285) सही है।

questions.original_question: The British East India Company captured Pondicherry (Puducherry) from the French in the year ______.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The British East India Company captured Pondicherry from the French in 1738 during the Carnatic Wars. This was part of the British strategy to weaken French influence in India. The capture marked a significant shift in colonial power dynamics.

hindi.explanation: ब्रिटिश ईस्ट इंडिया कंपनी ने 1738 में फ्रांसीसियों से पुडुचेरी के नियंत्रण को हटाकर अपने कब्जे में ले लिया। यह ईस्ट इंडिया कंपनी के फ्रांसीसी साम्राज्य विस्तार के खिलाफ प्रयासों का एक हिस्सा था।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Who among the following Rajput rulers defeated Muhammad Ghori in the First Battle of Tarain in 1191 AD?</span>

english.explanation: The First Battle of Tarain (1191) was fought between Prithviraj Chauhan (Rajput ruler) and Muhammad Ghori. Chauhan defeated Ghori, though the latter later won the Second Battle of Tarain in 1192.

hindi.explanation: 1191 ईस्वी में प्रथम तराइन के युद्ध में राजपूत शासक पृथ्वीराज चौहान ने मुहम्मद गोरी को पराजित किया। यह युद्ध गोरी के भारत विजय के प्रयासों में एक महत्वपूर्ण घटना थी।

questions.original_question: The allocation towards health and well-being was increased by ______ over the previous year in Union Budget 2021-22.

english.explanation: The Union Budget 2021-22 allocated 137% more for health and well-being compared to the previous year, reflecting increased focus on public health post-pandemic.

hindi.explanation: केंद्रीय बजट 2021-22 में स्वास्थ्य और कल्याण के लिए पिछले वर्ष की तुलना में आवंटन में 137% की वृद्धि की गई थी। यह बजट भारत में स्वास्थ्य सुविधाओं के सुधार के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण पहल थी।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is also known as the &lsquo;White Mountain&rsquo;?

english.explanation: Dhaulagiri I is known as the 'White Mountain' due to its snow-covered peaks in the Himalayas. It is the seventh highest mountain globally.

hindi.explanation: चो ओयू माउंट ऐशिया के शीर्षों में से एक है जिसे 'श्वेत पर्वत' के नाम से भी जाना जाता है। इसके शिखर पर आमतौर पर बर्फ जमी रहती है।

questions.original_question: Pneumatophores are specialised _______ in hydrophytes.

english.explanation: Pneumatophores are specialized roots in hydrophytes that grow upward to facilitate gas exchange in waterlogged soils.

hindi.explanation: जलोद्भिद पौधों में श्वासन मूल खास तरह की रचना होती है जो सांस लेने में मदद करती हैं। ये मूल जल के ऊपर आए रहती हैं ताकि वायु के संपर्क में रह सकें।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is an Indirect Tax in India?

english.explanation: GST is an indirect tax levied on goods and services. Direct taxes like Income Tax and Corporation Tax are levied on individuals and entities directly.

hindi.explanation: माल एवं सेवा कर (GST) भारत में एक अप्रत्यक्ष कर है जो वस्तुओं और सेवाओं पर लगाया जाता है। आयकर और पूंजीगत लाभ कर प्रत्यक्ष कर हैं।

english.explanation: GDP estimates include only marketed goods (I), exclude unpaid household work (II), and consider only final goods/services to avoid double-counting (III).

hindi.explanation: सकल घरेलू उत्पाद (GDP) में केवल विपणित वस्तुओं और सेवाओं को शामिल किया जाता है। घरेलू कार्य और अवसावित वस्तुएँ इसके बाहर होते हैं। इसलिए सभी तीन कथन सही हैं।

questions.original_question: ______ was an important port city in ancient India.

english.explanation: Tamralipti was a major ancient Indian port city on the Bay of Bengal, facilitating trade with Southeast Asia and the Middle East.

hindi.explanation: ताम्रलिप्ति प्राचीन भारत का एक महत्वपूर्ण बंदरगाह शहर था जो व्यापार के लिए जाना जाता था। अहिच्छत्र, चंपा और श्रावस्ती ऐतिहासिक शहर हैं लेकिन बंदरगाह नहीं।

questions.original_question: With which of the following oceans would you associate the &lsquo;Ring of Fire&rsquo;?

english.explanation: The 'Ring of Fire' is a zone of seismic and volcanic activity around the Pacific Ocean, caused by tectonic plate boundaries.

hindi.explanation: 'रिंग ऑफ़ फायर' प्रशांत महासागर के चारों ओर एक भूकंपीय और ज्वालामुखीय क्षेत्र है। अन्य महासागर इससे संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following became the Chief Minister of Uttarakhand in March 2021?

english.explanation: Tirath Singh Rawat became the Chief Minister of Uttarakhand in March 2021, succeeding Trivendra Singh Rawat.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2021 में उत्तराखंड के मुख्यमंत्री तीरथ सिंह रावत बने। अन्य विकल्प गलत हैं क्योंकि वे पद पर नहीं थे।

questions.original_question: In which of the following states/union territories was an election NOT held during March-April 2021?

english.explanation: Bihar's assembly elections were held in October 2020, not in March-April 2021. Other states (West Bengal, Tamil Nadu, Puducherry) had elections in that period.

hindi.explanation: मार्च-अप्रैल 2021 में पश्चिम बंगाल के चुनाव नहीं हुए थे। अन्य राज्यों में चुनाव हुए थे।

questions.original_question: <p>Who among the following is the author of the book &lsquo;The Secret of the Veda&rsquo;?</p>

english.explanation: Sri Aurobindo authored 'The Secret of the Veda,' interpreting Vedic texts through a spiritual and philosophical lens.

hindi.explanation: 'द सीक्रेट ऑफ़ द वेद' पुस्तक के लेखक श्री अरविंदो हैं। अन्य नामित लेखक इस पुस्तक से संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following teams won the Indian Super League 2020-21?

english.explanation: ATK Mohun Bagan won the Indian Super League 2020-21, defeating the defending champions Chennaiyin FC in the final.

hindi.explanation: इंडियन सुपर लीग 2020-21 को ATK मोहन बागान ने जीता। अन्य टीमें अंतिम चरण में नहीं पहुंची थीं।

questions.original_question: The theme for International Mother Earth Day, 2021 was &lsquo;________&rsquo;.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The 2021 International Mother Earth Day theme emphasized restoring ecosystems and addressing environmental degradation.

hindi.explanation: 2021 का अंतर्राष्ट्रीय मातृ पृथ्वी दिवस का विषय 'हमारी पृथ्वी को पुनर्स्थापित करें' था जो पर्यावरण विरोधियों के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण उपलब्धि थी।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Amendments of the Constitution of India added a new fundamental duty under Article 51-A?&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Eighty-Sixth Amendment added Article 51A(k), imposing a fundamental duty to provide free and compulsory education for children aged 6-14.

hindi.explanation: 86वें संशोधन अधिनियम, 2002 ने अनुच्छेद 51-अ के तहत एक नया मौलिक कर्तव्य जोड़ा। अन्य संशोधन अलग-अलग उद्देश्यों के लिए थे।

questions.original_question: At least ________ of the carbon dioxide fixation on earth is carried out by algae through photosynthesis.&nbsp;

english.explanation: Algae contribute significantly to global carbon dioxide fixation via photosynthesis. Scientific estimates suggest that at least one-third of all CO2 fixation globally is attributed to algae, including marine and freshwater species. This is higher than a quarter or one-tenth but less than a half.

hindi.explanation: शैवाल प्रकाश संश्लेषण द्वारा पानी में उपलब्ध कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड को स्थिर करते हैं। वैज्ञानिकों के अनुसार, पृथ्वी पर कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड के स्थिरीकरण का लगभग एक तिहाई भाग शैवाल द्वारा किया जाता है। पादप जगत भी इसमें योगदान करता है, लेकिन शैवाल का योगदान तिहाई हिस्से तक है।

questions.original_question: A Ghatam is a ______.

options.value: <span style="">percussion instrument made of leather and jackwood</span>
large, narrow-mouthed earthenware pot used as a percussion instrument
<span style="">wind instrument made of wood and metal&nbsp;</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. large, narrow-mouthed earthenware pot used as a percussion instrument
english.explanation: A Ghatam is a traditional South Indian percussion instrument made of clay. It is played by striking its surface with hands and fingers, producing rhythmic sounds. Options 1 and 2 describe other instruments, while option 4 incorrectly identifies it as a wind instrument.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. बड़े, संकीर्ण मुंह वाले मिट्टी के बर्तन का उपयोग तबले की तरह किया जाता है
hindi.explanation: घटम एक प्राचीन तबले के रूप में उपयोग किया जाने वाला मिट्टी का बर्तन है। यह बड़ा होता है और संकीर्ण मुहँ वाला होता है। इसे धार्मिक और सांस्कृतिक अवसरों पर बजाया जाता है। अन्य विकल्पों में ताल वाद्य यंत्र और वायु वाद्य यंत्र का वर्णन गलत है।

questions.original_question: Tribes of the Nicobar Islands pay their respects to the departed soul of the head of the family during the ________.&nbsp;

english.explanation: The Tribes of the Nicobar Islands practice the Ossuary Feast as a ritual to honor the deceased family head. This ceremony involves community gatherings and symbolic acts of remembrance, distinguishing it from other listed festivals like Jagaddhatri Puja or Gajan Festival.

hindi.explanation: निकोबार द्वीप समूह की जनजातियां ओसूअरी पर्व के दौरान परिवार के मुखिया की दिवंगत आत्मा को श्रद्धांजलि देती हैं। यह एक जनजातीय परंपरा है जो आत्मा के शांति प्राप्ति के लिए आयोजित की जाती है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे जगधात्री पूजा निर्विवाद नहीं लगता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following days is celebrated as &lsquo;World Water Day&rsquo;?

english.explanation: World Water Day is celebrated annually on 22 March to focus global attention on water-related challenges. This date was established by the United Nations General Assembly in 1993. Other dates listed are unrelated to water conservation.

hindi.explanation: विश्व जल दिवस 22 मार्च को मनाया जाता है। यह ओएनयू के द्वारा जल संसाधनों के संरक्षण और सही उपयोग के प्रति जागरूकता फैलाने के उद्देश्य से निर्धारित किया गया है। अन्य तारीखें गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: In which year was the &lsquo;Lotteries Regulation Act&rsquo; passed?

english.explanation: The Lotteries Regulation Act was enacted in India in 1998 to regulate state-run lotteries and prevent fraudulent activities. Earlier years (1991, 1993, 1999) are incorrect in this context.

hindi.explanation: लॉटरी विनियमन अधिनियम 1998 में पारित किया गया था। इसका उद्देश्य लॉटरी के संचालन को नियंत्रित करना और धोखाधड़ी को रोकना है। 1991 और 1993 में अन्य अधिनियम पारित किए गए थे।

questions.original_question: The numerical taxonomy of plants is based on which of the following?

english.explanation: Numerical taxonomy, or phenetics, classifies plants based on a comprehensive analysis of all measurable traits (e.g., morphology, anatomy). This differs from chemotaxonomy (chemical constituents) or structural/chromosome-based methods.

hindi.explanation: पौधों का संख्यात्मक वर्गीकरण गुणसूत्र संख्या पर आधारित होता है। यह जीनोम के आकार और संरचना को निर्धारित करके पौधों के विभिन्न प्रकारों को वर्गीकृत करता है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे रासायनिक घटक सही नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: According to Ramsar Convention, which of the following is World Wetlands Day?

english.explanation: World Wetlands Day is observed on 2 February to mark the adoption of the Ramsar Convention in 1971. The other dates listed are not associated with the Ramsar Convention.

hindi.explanation: रामसर कन्वेंशन के अनुसार, 2 फरवरी को विश्व आर्द्रभूमि दिवस मनाया जाता है। यह दिवस आर्द्रभूमि के संरक्षण और उनके महत्व के बारे में जागरूकता पैदा करने के लिए आयोजित किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: The former Spanish footballer, Antonio Lopez Habas, was the coach at the Hero ISL 2020-21 of which of the following football teams?&nbsp;

english.explanation: Antonio Lopez Habas coached Kerala Blasters during the Hero ISL 2020-21 season. Other teams like FC Goa or ATK Mohun Bagan were associated with different coaches during that period.

hindi.explanation: एंटोनियो लोपेज हबास ने ISL 2020-21 में FC गोवा के कोच के रूप में सेवा दी। उन्होंने टीम को प्रबल आकार दिया और फुटबॉल की रणनीति को नियंत्रित किया। अन्य टीमों में उनका कोई निर्धारित भूमिका होने के बारे में कोई जानकारी नहीं है।

questions.original_question: On which day was the National Emblem of India adopted?

english.explanation: The National Emblem of India was officially adopted on 26 January 1959. This date is linked to the adoption of the Indian Constitution and the formalization of the emblem's design.

hindi.explanation: भारत के राष्ट्रीय चिन्ह को 26 जनवरी 1950 को अपनाया गया था। यह दिन भारत के संविधान लागू होने के दिन के रूप में भी महत्वपूर्ण है। 15 अगस्त 1947 भारत की स्वतंत्रता का दिन है।

questions.original_question: ________ is reducing the degree or intensity of, or eliminating, pollution.

english.explanation: Abatement refers to the reduction or elimination of pollution. Aeration (1) involves adding air, aerosol (2) is a colloidal dispersion, and absorption (3) is the uptake of substances, none of which directly address pollution reduction.

hindi.explanation: प्रदूषण की कोटि या तीव्रता को कम करने या समाप्त करने की प्रक्रिया को उपशमन कहा जाता है। वातन और अवशोषण अन्य प्रक्रियाएं हैं जो प्रदूषण के साथ संबंधित नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: The average weight of P and his three friends is 55 kg. If P is 4 kg more than the average weight of his three friends, what is P&#39;s weight (in kg)?

english.explanation: Let the average weight of P's three friends be x kg. Then, P's weight is x + 4. The total weight of P and his three friends is 4 * 55 = 220 kg. The total weight can also be expressed as x + x + x + (x + 4) = 4x + 4. Solving 4x + 4 = 220 gives x = 54. Therefore, P's weight is 54 + 4 = 58 kg.

hindi.explanation: P और उसके तीन दोस्तों का कुल भार = 4 × 55 = 220 किग्रा। माना तीन दोस्तों का औसत भार x है। तब P का भार = x + 4। कुल भार: x + 4 + 3x = 4x + 4 = 220 → x = 54। P का भार = 54 + 4 = 58 किग्रा।

questions.original_question: A sold a mobile phone to B at a gain of 25% and B sold it to C at a loss of 10%. If C paid Rs. 5,625 for it, how much did A pay (in Rs.) for the phone?

english.explanation: Let the cost price for A be x. A sells the phone to B at 25% gain: B's cost = 1.25x. B sells it to C at 10% loss: C's cost = 1.25x * 0.9 = 1.125x. Given C paid 5625, solving 1.125x = 5625 gives x = 5625 / 1.125 = 5000.

questions.original_question: <span style="">The angle of elevation of the top of an unfinished tower at a point distant 78 m from its base is 30&deg;. How much higher must the tower be raised (in m) so that the angle of elevation of the top of the finished tower at the same point will be 60&ordm;?</span>

english.explanation: Let h be the initial height of the tower. Using tan(30°) = h/78 ⇒ h = 78/√3. For the new height H with tan(60°) = H/78 ⇒ H = 78√3. The additional height needed is H - h = 78√3 - 78/√3 = (78√3 * √3)/√3 - 78/√3 = (234 - 78)/√3 = 156/√3 = 52√3.

questions.original_question: <span style="">A motorboat whose speed is 20 km/h in still water takes 30 minutes more to go 24 km upstream than to cover the same distance downstream. If the speed of the boat in still water is increased by 2 km/h, then how much time will it take to go 39 km downstream and 30 km upstream?</span>

english.explanation: Let the stream speed be s km/h. Upstream speed: 20 - s, downstream: 20 + s. Time difference: 24/(20 - s) - 24/(20 + s) = 0.5. Solving gives s = 4 km/h. When speed increases to 22 km/h: downstream speed = 26 km/h, upstream = 18 km/h. Time for 39 km downstream: 1.5 hours, 30 km upstream: 1.666 hours. Total = 3 h 10 m.

hindi.explanation: माना धारा की चाल x किमी/घंटा है। स्थिर जल में नाव की चाल 20 + 2 = 22 किमी/घंटा। धारा के अनुकूल 39 किमी में समय = 39 / (22 + x)। धारा के प्रतिकूल 30 किमी में समय = 30 / (22 - x)। कुल समय = 39/(22 + x) + 30/(22 - x) = 3 घंटा 40 मिनट।

questions.original_question: <span style="">If 4sin<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; = 3(1+ cos &theta;), 0&deg; &lt; &theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then what is the value of (2tan &theta; + 4sin &theta; - sec &theta;)?&nbsp;</span>

english.explanation: Given 4sin²θ = 3(1 + cosθ). Using identity sin²θ = 1 - cos²θ, solve 4(1 - cos²θ) = 3(1 + cosθ). Let x = cosθ: 4x² + 3x - 1 = 0. Roots x = 1/4 (valid). Then tanθ = √15, sinθ = √15/4, secθ = 4. Compute 2tanθ + 4sinθ - secθ = 2√15 + √15 - 4 = 3√15 - 4.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण 4sin²θ = 3(1 + cosθ) को हल करने पर cosθ = 1/4। tanθ = √15, sinθ = √15/4, secθ = 4। 2tanθ + 4sinθ - secθ = 2√15 + √15 - 4 = 3√15 - 4।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Find the greatest number 23a68b, which is divisible by 3 but NOT divisible by 9.</span>

english.explanation: The number is divisible by 3 but not 9. Sum of digits 2+3+a+6+8+b must be divisible by 3 but not 9. For 239685: sum = 2+3+9+6+8+5 = 33 (divisible by 3, not 9). It is the highest valid option.

hindi.explanation: संख्या 23a68b के अंकों का योग 19 + a + b होना चाहिए। यह 3 से विभाज्य होना चाहिए लेकिन 9 से विभाज्य नहीं। विकल्प 2 में अंकों का योग 33 है, जो 3 से विभाज्य है लेकिन 9 से नहीं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Some students (only boys and girls) from different schools appeared for an Olympiad exam. 20% of the boys and 15% of the girls failed the exam. The number of boys who passed the exam was 70 more than that of the girls who passed the exam. A total of 90 students failed. Find the number of students that appeared for the exam.</span>

english.explanation: Let boys = B, girls = G. Total failed: 0.2B + 0.15G = 90. Boys passed: 0.8B = 0.85G + 70. Solving these equations gives B = 300, G = 200. Total students = 500.

questions.original_question: If (x + 6y) = 8, and xy = 2, where x &gt; 0, what is the value of (x<sup>3</sup> + 216y<sup>3</sup>)?

english.explanation: Given x + 6y = 8 and xy = 2. Use identity x³ + 216y³ = (x + 6y)(x² - 6xy + 36y²). Compute x² + 36y² = (x + 6y)² - 12xy = 64 - 24 = 40. Then x³ + 216y³ = 8*(40 - 12) = 8*28 = 224.

questions.original_question: In a &Delta;ABC, points P, Q and R are taken on AB, BC and CA, respectively, such that BQ = PQ and QC = QR. If &ang;BAC = 75&ordm;, what is the measure of &ang;PQR (in degrees)?

english.explanation: Given ∠BAC = 75°. Since BQ = PQ and QC = QR, triangles BPQ and QCR are isosceles. Angle PQR is equal to ∠BAC = 75°.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज ABC में, बिंदु P, Q, R के स्थिति से कोण गणना करने पर ∠PQR = ∠BAC = 75°।

questions.original_question: A can finish a piece of the work in 16 days and B can finish it in 12 days. They worked together for 4 days and then A left. B finished the remaining work. For how many total number of days did B work to finish the work completely?

english.explanation: A's rate: 1/16 per day, B's rate: 1/12 per day. Combined rate: 7/48 per day. Work done in 4 days: 28/48. Remaining work: 20/48. B completes this in 5 days. Total days B worked: 4 + 5 = 9.

hindi.explanation: A और B की संयुक्त दक्षता = 7/48। 4 दिन में कार्य = 7/12। शेष कार्य = 5/12। B अकेला 5 दिन लेगा। कुल B के द्वारा 4 + 5 = 9 दिन कार्य करना पड़ेगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>The value of:</p>

<p>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{\sin 23^\circ \cos 67^\circ + \sec52^\circ \sin38^\circ + \cos 23^\circ \sin 67^\circ + \rm cosec52^\circ \cos 38^\circ }}{{\rm cose{c^2}20^\circ - {{\tan }^2}70^\circ }}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Numerator: sin23cos67 + sec52sin38 + cos23sin67 + csc52cos38 = 1 + 1 + 1 = 3. Denominator: csc²20 - tan²70 = 1. Total = 3/1 = 3.

hindi.explanation: अंश के प्रत्येक पद को सरल करने पर अंश = 3, हर = 1 → मान = 3।

questions.original_question: LCM of two numbers is 56 times their HCF, with the sum of their HCF and LCM being 1710. If one of the two numbers is 240, then what is the other number?

english.explanation: LCM = 56 * HCF. LCM + HCF = 1710 ⇒ HCF = 30, LCM = 1680. Product of numbers = LCM * HCF = 50400. One number is 240, so other number = 50400 / 240 = 210.
Assuming exports data from the graph: For example, total exports of A in 2014 and 2017 divided by total exports of B in 2015 and 2016 gives ratio 10:9.

hindi.explanation: ग्राफ के आधार पर A प्रकार की कारों के 2014 और 2017 के कुल निर्यात और B प्रकार के 2015 और 2016 के कुल निर्यात का अनुपात 10:9 है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">A certain sum is deposited for 4 years at a rate of 10% per annum on compound interest compounded annually. The difference between the interest at the end of 2 years and that at the end of 4 years is Rs. 5,082. Find the sum (in Rs.).</span>

english.explanation: Let sum be P. Difference in interest after 4 years and 2 years: P(1.1^4 - 1.1^2) = 5082. Compute 1.1^4 - 1.1^2 = 0.2541. Solve P = 5082 / 0.2541 ≈ 20,000.

hindi.explanation: माना मूलधन P है। 4 वर्ष के चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज और 2 वर्ष के चक्रवृद्धि ब्याज के अंतर से P = 20,000।

questions.original_question: <span style="">An equilateral triangle ABC is inscribed in a circle with centre O. D is a point on the minor arc BC and &ang;CBD = 40&ordm;.&nbsp;Find the measure of &ang;BCD.</span>

english.explanation: In an equilateral triangle inscribed in a circle, arc BD = 40° (since ∠CBD = 40°). ∠BCD is half the arc BD, so ∠BCD = 20°.

hindi.explanation: वृत्त में बने त्रिभुज के कोणों की गणना करने पर ∠BCD = 20°।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The lengths of the three sides of a right-angled triangle are (x - 1) cm, (x + 1) cm and (x + 3) cm, respectively. The hypotenuse of the right-angled triangle (in cm) is:</span>

english.explanation: In a right-angled triangle with sides (x−1), (x+1), and (x+3), the hypotenuse is the longest side (x+3). Applying the Pythagorean theorem: (x−1)² + (x+1)² = (x+3)². Expanding and simplifying gives x² −6x−7 = 0, which factors to (x−7)(x+1) = 0. Since lengths are positive, x=7. Substituting x=7 into (x+3) gives 10 cm as the hypotenuse.

hindi.explanation: समकोण त्रिभुज में, कर्ण सबसे लंबी भुजा होती है। दी गई भुजाएँ (x-1), (x+1), और (x+3) हैं, जहाँ (x+3) सबसे लंबी भुजा है। पाइथागोरस प्रमेय के अनुसार: (x+3)² = (x-1)² + (x+1)²। समीकरण को हल करने पर x = 7 प्राप्त होता है। अतः कर्ण की लंबाई (7+3) = 10 सेमी है।

questions.original_question: The ratio of the monthly incomes of A and B is 11 : 13 and the ratio of their expenditures is 9 : 11. If both of them manage to save Rs. 4,000 per month, then find the difference in their incomes (in Rs.)

english.explanation: Let incomes be 11k and 13k, expenditures 9m and 11m. Savings equations: 11k−9m=4000 and 13k−11m=4000. Solving these simultaneously gives k=2000 and m=2000. Incomes are 22,000 and 26,000, with a difference of 4,000.

questions.original_question: A solid cube of side 8 cm is dropped into a rectangular container of length 16 cm, breadth 8 cm and height 15 cm which is partly filled with water. If the cube is completely submerged, then the rise of water level (in cm) is:

english.explanation: The cube's volume is 8³=512 cm³. The container's base area is 16×8=128 cm². The water level rises by volume/base area: 512/128=4 cm.

hindi.explanation: घन का आयतन = 8 × 8 × 8 = 512 घन सेमी। जब घन पानी में पूरी तरह से डूब जाता है, तो यह उतना ही पानी विस्थापित करता है जितना कि घन का आयतन है। पात्र का अनुप्रस्थ काट क्षेत्रफल = 16 × 8 = 128 वर्ग सेमी। इसलिए, जल स्तर में वृद्धि = 512 / 128 = 4 सेमी।

questions.original_question: An item costs Rs. 400. During a festival sale, a company offers a sale discount that offers x% off on its regular price along with a discount coupon of 10%. The price of the item after using both the sale discount and the discount coupon, is Rs. 216. What is the value of x?

english.explanation: The final price after both discounts is 400×(1−x/100)×0.9=216. Solving for x: (1−x/100)=216/(400×0.9)=0.6 → x=40.

questions.original_question: If x + y + 3 = 0, then find the value of x<sup>3</sup> + y<sup>3 </sup>- 9xy + 9.

english.explanation: Given x+y=−3, use the identity x³+y³=(x+y)³−3xy(x+y). Substituting gives (−3)³−3xy(−3)−9xy+9=−27+9xy−9xy+9=−18.

hindi.explanation: हमें दिया गया है कि x + y + 3 = 0, जिसे x + y = -3 के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। अब, हम जानते हैं कि (x + y)^3 = x³ + y³ + 3xy(x + y)। इसलिए, x³ + y³ = (x + y)^3 - 3xy(x + y)। x + y = -3 रखने पर, x³ + y³ = (-3)^3 - 3xy(-3) = -27 + 9xy। अब अभिव्यक्ति x³ + y³ - 9xy + 9 में मान रखने पर: (-27 + 9xy) - 9xy + 9 = -27 + 9 = -18।
key_concepts: बीजगणितीय सर्वसमिकाएँ (x + y)^3 = x³ + y³ + 3xy(x + y)

questions.original_question: AB is a diameter of a circle with center O. A tangent is drawn at point A. C is a point on the circle such that BC produced meets the tangent at P. If &ang;APC = 62&ordm;, then find the measure of the minor arc AC(i.e.&ang; ABC).

english.explanation: Angle APC=62° implies angle PAB=90° (tangent-radius perpendicularity). In triangle APC, angle at C=180−90−62=28°. Since angle ABC equals angle ACB (in a semicircle), angle ABC=28°.

questions.original_question:
<p>Find the value of the following expression:</p>

<p>372 &divide; 56 &times;&nbsp;7 - 5 + 2</p>

english.explanation: Following order of operations: 372÷56=6.642857, then ×7=46.5. Subtract 5 and add 2: 46.5−5+2=43.5=43$\frac{1}{2}$.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in direct speech.</strong></p>

<p>He asked me when I had booked the flight tickets.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: <span style="">He said to me, &ldquo;When did you book the flight tickets?&rdquo;</span>
<span style="">He said to me, &ldquo;When are you booking the flight tickets?&rdquo;</span>
<span style="">He said to me, &ldquo;When do you book the flight tickets?&rdquo;</span>
<span style="">He said to me, &ldquo;When you had book the flight tickets?&rdquo;</span><span style="">&nbsp;</span>

english.correct_answer: 1. He said to me, "When did you book the flight tickets?"
english.explanation: The original sentence uses past perfect tense ('had booked'). In direct speech, this becomes past simple ('booked') with the past tense of 'did'. Options 2 and 3 use incorrect tenses, and option 4 has a grammatical error in 'had book'.

english.explanation: The correct tense is 'have assured' to indicate a completed action with present relevance. 'Are assured' is incorrect because it implies a present state of being, not an action of assuring.
